review: Due to some issues we have been forced to visit Rainbow Children's Hospital, Marathahalli. My wife has given a birth to a preterm baby which was 732 Grams in weight. That time we met Dr. Rajat Athreya & team,who became saviours of my child's life. The way the treatment given by them was extraordinary. The confidence and the counselling given to the parents was awesome. They have given a new life to my child and to us as well. I thank each and everyone of the hospital staff for their extraordinary treatment. I recommend everyone for their neonatal issues and fertility issues as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had been seeing Dr. Rajath for my daughter. She contracted severe cold at just one month of age. He prescribed medicines and did not push for hospital admission. He is very gentle and I am surprised to read reviews stating that he is not approachable. Some cases require hospitalization since immunity of babies and adults are different. So it's not fair to say that Dr. is unnecessarily pushing for hospitalization. In fact in our case the cold was so severe we thought hospitalization might be necessary. But Dr. Rajath assured us that it will not be needed and prescribed some medicines which cured our daughter eventually.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited him at Sakra Hospital for my son who had an abscess below his eyes. He patiently examined and referred me to the cosmetic surgeon. He called up the Dr. and explained as well. What was a pleasant surprise and act of courtesy, he transferred his fees to the cosmetic surgeon as well. I am so impressed with the attitude and gentle nature that would refer him to one and all.

Dr Rajath is an extremely caring and gentle person with immense patience to listen to his patients & their parents. My kids have benefited from his expertise and care. His friendly nature makes him very approachable. Thank you doctor for your advises.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
